newsitem.title: JAPAN: S&P assigns AA- rating to KEPCO straight bond.
newsitem.headline: S&P assigns AA- rating to KEPCO straight bond.

text.p: Standard & Poor's (S&P) said on Wednesday it had assigned its AA- rating to Korea Electric Power Corp's $300 million seven percent straight bond due on February 1, 2027.

S&P said the outlook for the rating was stable as continued favourable regulatory treatment was expected to maintain the company's strong financial profile in the face of heavy investment requirements.
